H0.text: The retina is the eye structure on which the lens and other parts of the eye focus a real image.

H1.text: The iris is the eye structure onto which the lens and other parts focus a real image.

H2.text: Pupil is the eye structure on which the lens and other parts of the eye focus a real image.

H3.text: Cornea is the eye structure onto which the lens and other parts of the eye focus a real image.

A4.text: Along with the cornea, aqueous, and vitreous humours, the lens refracts light, focusing it onto the retina.
